Auckland kidnapping: Bernadette Rawiri jailed for woman’s torture over cryptocurrency password https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz/crime/auckland-kidnapping-bernadette-rawir-jail- womans-womans-torture-over-cryptocurrency-pass-pass-pass-password/vw6fhed2mjctjctjctjctjctjltfecevevefvuwe/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz/crime/auckland-kidnapping-bernadette-rawir-jail- womans-womans-torture-over-cryptocurrency-pass-pass-pass-password/vw6fhed2mjctjctjctjctjctjltfecevevefvuwe/ Craig KapitanThe captors wanted a crypto password.
